summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 5.72.020, 5.73.020, 23.34.008, 23.34.010, 23.34.020, 23.34.022, 23.71.001, 23.84.030, 23.84.036 and Section 25.05.675 of the Seattle Municipal Code to update references and adopt implementing regulations consistent with 2004 Comprehensive Plan amendments.
